#summary DataTables Editable Live Demo

= Introduction =

In this section can be found live examples of the JQuery !DataTables Editable plugin usage. 
Demo site contains the following examples:
  * [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/index.html Basic Example] Basic example showing how rows in the table can be selected, deleted and edited
  * [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/addingrecords.html Adding records] Example where is shown how the new records can be added
